page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE...
page.content: {A DAY IN MY LIFE by Andrew Martin Saturday.I got up and went downstairs for breakfast_the usual,boring........ cornflakes.I watched television for about two hours,then went to get dressed.I put on my jeans and Aston Villa top.Mum then asked me to go shopping.It took me about half an hour.When I got back I was excited because today was the cub's cup final day.I played on the computer for a while,then I got my football kit packed and set of for the football ground.We all had our team photograph taken.I was playing in defence.We played well for the first ten minutes and soon led 1-0.That day was hot so at half time were soaked down with a freezing cold bucket of water.In the second half we scored to make it 2-0. After the match we were excited and happy about winning.
